Package jadex.testcases.plans

This package contains testcases related to plans.

See:
          Description

Capabilities
MLR Test meta-level reasoning.
 

Agents
AtomicException Testing the atomic operation for plans.
BeliefTrigger Test a plan's trigger.
Countdown Test a plan's context condition.
InlinePlan Test an inline plan.
MLRRetry Test retry in meta-level reasoning.
MicroPlanStepExecution Test the micro-plan step execution of plans.
MultiplePlanTriggers Test multiple plan triggers In this test scenario a plan has more than one plan trigger, e.g. a beliefchange and a condition.
PingBinding Tests binding values for a plan.
PlanAbort Plan Abort Agent Tests if abortion of plans is properly synchronized.
PlanCondition Test an activation condition of a plan.
PlanContext Tests a plan with a context condition.
PlanFail Test the plan's failed() method.
PlanMetaLevelReasoning Test meta-level reasoning.
PlanParameters Test plan parameters.
PlanPass Test the plan's passed() method.
PlanPassedFailed Test the plans passed() and failed() methods.
PlanPriorities This agent tests plan priorities.
PlanTermination This agent tests plan termination.
Precondition Tests precondition for a plan.
TimeoutException Test timed waitFor method calls.
WaitForBelief Test waiting for belief changes.
WaitForBeliefSet Test waiting for belief changes.
WaitForMaxLong Test waiting for Long.MAX_VALUE msecs.
WaitqueueTest Test the waitqueue of plans.
 

Package jadex.testcases.plans Description

This package contains testcases related to plans.
